text: 2 birds eye chilli or Thai chillies (, deseeded, very finely chopped (Note 2))
label: ingredient

text: 200 g /7oz chicken thighs (, cut into bite size pieces (breast ok too))
label: ingredient

text: 1 cup Thai or Thai Holy Basil leaves ((sub regular basil, Note 3))
label: ingredient

text: Mix Sauce in a small bowl.
label: step

text: Heat oil in wok or large heavy based skillet over high heat.
label: step

text: Add garlic and chilli and cook for 10 seconds. Don't inhale - the chilli will make you cough!
label: step

text: Add chicken and fish sauce, and fry until cooked, around 2 minutes.
label: step

text: Add green onion, noodles and sauce and cook for 1 minute until the sauce reduces and coats the noodles.
label: step

text: Remove from heat and immediately add basil, toss until just wilted, then serve immediately.
